issue.title: [Python] CompressedInputStream doesn't support str or file objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14309](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14309). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While in `CompressedOutputStream` we support providing `str` or `file` objects, for `CompressedInputStream` we currently don't, which makes the class harder to use.
